      • sendOrder

        public boolean sendOrder​(Order order)
                  throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Processing the received order: assigning a unique ID, adding to the queue if the pizzeria is still open and rejecting the order if the pizzeria is closed.
        Parameters:
        order - received order
        Returns:
        order confirmation or rejection
        Throws:
